members.joinCircumstances: Founder and captain of the crew.

keyMoments.title: Gally Pirates Defeated by Smoker
keyMoments.description: The Gally Pirates attempt to raid warehouses in Loguetown but are quickly defeated by Captain Smoker, demonstrating they are no match for a Logia-type Devil Fruit user.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that not all pirates make it past Loguetown to the Grand Line, establishing Smoker's reputation as the gatekeeper of East Blue.
